title: Mine action in Bosnia and Herzegovina in 2019 and 2020
description: The operations of the ITF Representative Office in Bosnia and Herzegovina in 2019 in 2020 will facilitate the smooth implementation of the required organisational procedures, public calls for applications, mine action projects, support for national structures and the presence of ITF as an organisation directly involved in the financing, monitoring and implementation of demining projects in Bosnia and Herzegovina, the assessment of humanitarian and socio-economic aspects of the project, drafting reports for donors, oversight of the implementation of demining and evaluating the quality and eligibility of projects and work sites.
